name: Let's CUBING
description:
Information:

Game name: Let's CUBING

Made By: BLUE DINO

How to play: Press Left & Right Arrow to control the cube's movement.

Support Platform: pc only

Notes:
All levels can be chosen, and the levels are divided into Normal and Challenge.  When level complete, it will jump into the next level automatically, if game over, the cube will be recovered form the level player lose. If the pages refresh, player begin the game from 'Start'.

Thanks for playing my first game. (σ′▽‵)′▽‵)σ Please be patient with loading complete before opening the full screen, thanks. If there are any problem, please contact me, thanks a a lot!!! Many things still need to be improved.

Welcome any great suggestions or ideas, which is very important and helpful for me :))

Recommend to open the fullscreen to have better playing experience✧*｡٩(ˊᗜˋ*)و✧*｡
(Scrolling to the right of the game,  pressing the blue button at the corner can open the fullscreen)

資訊欄：

遊戲名稱：Let's CUBING
製作者：BLUE DINO
操作方式：鍵盤左右鍵來控制方向
支援平台：目前只提供”電腦“進行遊戲

介紹：關卡可以自行選擇哦，每過一個關卡會自動跳轉到下一關，關卡有分一般/挑戰，請耐心等待至進度條跑完再打開全螢幕謝謝，遊戲沒有暫停功能，如果輸了會自動跳回所在關卡的起點

建議打開全螢幕擁有更佳的遊戲體驗✧*｡٩(ˊᗜˋ*)و✧*｡
(遊戲滾輪右拉，按下右下的藍色按鈕即可打開全螢幕）

後記：
謝謝各位來體驗我的第一個小遊戲，終於從各種難產中誕生了：）還有很多很多需要改善，希望還有機會再來做其他的遊戲，如果遊戲中有什麼問題，麻煩通知我進行修正！遊戲小新手繼續努力der ⸜(* ॑꒳ ॑* )⸝
歡迎提出任何的大大小小建議：）非常感謝大家的建議！
